description:
When attorneys Jeff Foreman and Jim Watson founded Foreman Watson, LLP, now known as Foreman Watson Holtrey, LLP, in 1994, the focus was almost solely on real estate law. While our attorneys continue to offer assistance in that field of law, the attorneys at Foreman Watson Holtrey, LLP, now offer the residents of Hartford, Kentucky, and the surrounding area, including southern Indiana, legal services in a wide variety of practice areas, including:

• Personal injury law
• Workers’ Compensation law
• Probate and estate planning
• Family law, including child custody and divorce

In the more than 20 years since our firm's founding, not only have we expanded our practice areas but also our firm's coverage area. Attorney Travis Holtrey joined our law firm as managing partner in 2012, bringing years of experience in personal injury law with him. In addition, we are now better able to serve all of the residents of the area thanks to the addition of our two satellite law offices, including the one in Hartford, Kentucky.

If you suffered injuries in an accident, are considering a divorce, or have an estate planning or real estate need, you can feel assured that when you turn to the experienced attorneys at the law firm of Foreman Watson Holtrey, LLP, for assistance, you will have a team of competent and hard working attorneys at your side. We will gladly examine your case and discuss your options during a free initial consultation. If you have concerns about your ability to afford legal representation, you may benefit from knowing that we accept most major credit cards.
